data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 5, Recife PE are pushing forward but Sander's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Goal! Pablo Felipe gives Sao Paulo a 0-1 lead in Recife.
In the minute 6, Luciano with an assist there.
Free kick Recife PE.
Sao Paulo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 12, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE push upfield and Ricardinho gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sao Paulo defence.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sao Paulo's Gabriel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
In the minute 19, Lucas Venuto (Recife PE) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Marquinhos (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 23, Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 25, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Igor Vinicius, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 27, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 28, Recife PE drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Elton of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reinaldo of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Recife PE.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 36, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 42, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Sao Paulo's Diego has been booked in Recife.
Sander gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
In the minute 43, Free kick Recife PE.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Recife PE.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Recife.
In the minute 45, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Ilha do Retiro.
The second-half has started.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Sander with Chico. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
In the minute 46, Chico (Recife PE) has received a first yellow card.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 48, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Recife PE are coming forward and Elton gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Ilha do Retiro.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 60, The match at Ilha do Retiro has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pablo Felipe, who is down injured.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 61, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a second substitution, with Bruninho replacing Marquinhos.
Patric for Recife PE drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 64, Adryelson (Recife PE) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In Recife Sao Paulo drive forward through Pablo Felipe. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 66, Adryelson is back on his feet again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Adryelson, who is grimacing with pain.
Luan is replacing Vitor Bueno for the away team.
Sao Paulo's Gabriel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Gabriel's header is off-target for Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Sao Paulo's area.
In the minute 71, Recife PE's Elton misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Recife PE's Jonathan Gomez breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 72, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 74, Daniel Paulista is making the team's third substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Lucas Mugni replacing Betinho.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Reinaldo (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Elton (Recife PE) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 76, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Igor Gomes is on a sub for Luciano for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Attention is being given to Sao Paulo’s Diego and play has been suspended briefly.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Diego for Sao Paulo is back on the field again.
Sao Paulo's Igor Gomes gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hernane Brocador is replacing Iago Maidana for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE make their fifth substitution with Ronaldo replacing Elton.
In the minute 84, It seems as if Diego is unable to continue. Robert Arboleda replaces him for the away team.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luan of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Free kick Recife PE.
Igor Vinicius for Sao Paulo has been booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows against Recife PE's Patric for offside.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Ilha do Retiro the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
